title: I can not access the shop. Is this a bug everyone has?
body: Nearly a week ago I tried to access the shop and it turned to a black screen but when I clicked on my profile and back to the shop it worked fine, But now when I try with this new patch I cant access it at all. It this a permanent bug or should I just re install or hey, uninstall? Kappa. Can anyone give me some advice?

replies.body:
They are aware of the issue and are working on it.
http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na
